text: A pastor is what a leader is called in some Christian Churches. The word pastor is Latin for "shepherd". == Other websites == * New Advent. The Catholic Encyclopedia's entry on the term pastor. * Gunpoint Pentecostal Church. A Pentecostal view on the term pastor. * Pastors' Families and Personal Lives A collection of resources about keeping a pastor's personal life vibrant. * Pastor's Role . A collection of articles about the role of a pastor in a church. * Pastoral Administration . Articles about a pastor's role as administrator of a church. Category:Christian religious occupations
title: Pastor
